channel.title: Barrows Chest
channel.description:
If anyone's played Rubikscape source, or Something similar.. then they'll know what i'm talking about lol.
In the barrows, you kill one brother, and are teleported to the next. When you get to the end, the last brother drops a key. You use the key on the chest, and it gives you Chaos runes, mind runes, cash, bolt racks, and a random barrows item.
I need help figuring out how to do that. When you use the key on the barrows chest, it gives you some items guaranteed, and a random barrows item. Btw I'm using ReapageScape source if that changes anything. Thanks. Oh and could you tell me where to add the code aswell, please.
Edit: Note i've already tried myself, and got 100 errors. So.. yeah.

item.title: Barrows Chest
item.dc:creator: @gamma gamma
item.description:
@gamma wrote:

Rubikscape is 508, Reapage is 317.

Can’t Copy and past the codes from 508 to 317. Simply not compatable.

Read full topic

item.title: Barrows Chest
item.dc:creator: @Mazeingmaze Mazeingmaze
item.description:
@Mazeingmaze wrote:

You will use an array which holds Item ID’s.

int[] items = { 7462, int r = (int) (Math.random() * items.length); addItem(items[r], 1);

You can add more.
What it basically means is that it will select a random number from the array we’ve created (items).

Then it will add the random item it picked to your inventory shown as items[r].
(Change the method’s a bit, but everything WILL work except the Additem.

Read full topic
